landing-1.title: Muhammad al-Khwarizmi's Legacy
landing-1.description: A completely free educational program specially designed for students in grades 7‚Äì11, offering modern, high-quality knowledge in relevant fields such as logistics, business management, and advanced technologies. The project aims to prepare the younger generation for the demands of the digital age by creating extensive opportunities to enhance their knowledge and skills.
landing-1.carouselAlt: Educational opportunities in the IT field

landing-2.title: IT Town
landing-2.description: This project is designed for talented young people living in remote rural areas of Uzbekistan. It identifies those interested in modern information technologies and provides them with free training in IT skills, foreign languages, and in-demand professions to unlock their potential.
landing-2.carouselAlt: Educational opportunities in the IT field

landing-3.title: IT Talents
landing-3.description: A project launched to train and support qualified specialists in the export of IT services. Non-governmental educational institutions can receive a one-time subsidy of up to 105 times the base calculation amount.
landing-3.carouselAlt: Educational opportunities in the IT field

landing-4.title: One Million Uzbek Developers
landing-4.description: A major educational initiative that provides the youth of Uzbekistan with the opportunity to secure a prominent place in the digital world by offering free education in IT and modern technologies.
landing-4.carouselAlt: Educational opportunities in the IT field

landing-5.title: ToT - The Training of Trainers
landing-5.description: By organizing online training sessions to teach IT mentors at educational centers modern professions, the opportunity is created to enhance their knowledge and skills in the most in-demand fields.
landing-5.carouselAlt: Educational opportunities in the IT field

landing-6.title: Job&Edu Fest
landing-6.description: This platform offers young people, students, and graduates interested in the IT field the opportunity to secure employment, undertake internships, and identify their professional direction. The event features major local and international IT companies operating in our country, higher education institutions, and training centers.
landing-6.carouselAlt: Educational opportunities in the IT field

landing-7.title: 'ICT4Girls' ‚Äì the Informatics Olympiad for schoolgirls in Uzbekistan.
landing-7.description: A project to boost schoolgirls' interest in competitive programming, develop their knowledge and skills, and prepare them for international informatics olympiads.
landing-7.carouselAlt: Educational opportunities in the IT field

landing-8.title: ACA Navigator
landing-8.description: A course that offers free online instruction in Python programming fundamentals and provides the opportunity to learn about high-demand professional specializations.
landing-8.carouselAlt: Educational opportunities in the IT field

landing-9.title: APIO ‚Äì Asia-Pacific Informatics Olympiad
landing-9.description: APIO ‚Äì the Asia‚ÄìPacific Informatics Olympiad ‚Äì is a prestigious programming competition in competitive programming held among students from countries in the Asia‚ÄìPacific region.
landing-9.carouselAlt: Educational opportunities in the IT field

landing-10.title: ICPC Uzbekistan Olympiad
landing-10.description: An Olympiad in competitive programming held among students, where the winning teams earn the opportunity to participate in the semifinals of the prestigious ICPC competition.
landing-10.carouselAlt: Educational opportunities in the IT field

landing-11.title: IT Iste'dod
landing-11.description: The project was introduced to reimburse the expenses incurred by young people for obtaining international IT certificates, as well as the costs of obtaining international professional IT certificates for those who already hold a B2 level or higher certificate.
landing-11.carouselAlt: Educational opportunities in the IT field

landing-12.title: Olympiads
landing-12.description: Local and prestigious international Olympiads in information technology and programming for youth.
landing-12.carouselAlt: Educational opportunities in the IT field

higherStandingOptimization.text: By Decree No. PF-269 of December 24, 2022, of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan 'On Measures to Implement the Administrative Reforms of New Uzbekistan,' the Ministry of Digital Technologies was established on the basis of the former Ministry for the Development of Information Technologies and Communications. The principal tasks and directions of the Ministry's work are as follows: Ensure implementation of a unified state policy in the field of information technologies and communications and in the rollout of 'e-government.' Develop and execute comprehensive programs for applying and advancing the national information and communication system in line with world-class IT standards. Further develop and modernize telecommunications infrastructure, including expanding broadband Internet access; ensure full transition of telephony, television, and radio broadcasting to digital systems; and carry out state functions of managing, licensing, and controlling communications activities and use of the radio-frequency spectrum. Coordinate across ministries, agencies, companies, organizations, and local government bodies to implement state programs for e-government, monitor, evaluate, and control their progress; and establish a unified system for the creation, storage, and use of state information resources and databases, as well as the development and management of interdepartmental information systems. Promote the further formation of the national segment of the Internet; create the technical and ergonomic conditions necessary to develop modern domestic web resources in various fields, meeting the information and intellectual needs of the population‚Äîespecially the younger generation. Support and coordinate production of competitive software products within the country, foster their domestic market and related services, and drive the adoption of modern software solutions, information systems, and resources in the real sectors of the economy and among consumers. Implement measures to ensure information security and to apply modern protection technologies for communication networks, software products, information systems, and resources; and further develop the technical infrastructure for safeguarding information assets. Organize scientific research and development in modern communication tools; oversee training, retraining, and professional development of personnel; and support the design and implementation of software products, information systems, and databases, as well as information-security initiatives and related ICT projects. Establish international cooperation in communications and information-technology fields; carry out priority projects; and attract foreign investment for efficient use of the radio-frequency spectrum and other activities within the Ministry's remit.

director.title: Director
director.description: Since February 10, 2025, he has been serving as the Director of the Center for the Development of Digital Education under the Ministry of Digital Technologies. Azamat Eshankulov has extensive experience in digital technologies...
director.fullDescription: Since February 10, 2025, he has been serving as the Director of the Center for the Development of Digital Education under the Ministry of Digital Technologies. Azamat Eshankulov has extensive experience in digital technologies and has successfully implemented a number of important projects. Throughout his career, he has promoted innovative ideas for the development and digitalization of the modern education system.

project_details: The 'Muhammad al-Khwarizmi Heirs' project aims to prepare students for high-demand careers in the labor market.
project_goal: By 2028, this system will be implemented nationwide in three stages, resulting in 50,000 skilled graduates ready for the job market.

hero.description: The "IT Talents" program provides a one-time subsidy system of up to 75 times the base calculation amount when a graduate of a non-governmental educational institution is employed in an IT service-exporting organization, and up to 105 times when a graduate with a disability is employed in such an organization.

aca.title: ACA Navigator - Python Programming Course
aca.description: The "ACA Navigator" project is implemented in partnership with the "Armenian Code Academy" educational center from Armenia.

cards.about1: What knowledge will project participants gain? Participants are given an understanding and information about why Python is so popular and what in-demand professions are available related to it.
cards.about2: They will learn Python basics and program in one of the most popular programming languages! Write their first code and strengthen theory through practice!
cards.partnership1: The project is implemented in partnership with the "Armenian Code Academy" educational center from Armenia. This international partnership creates quality educational opportunities.
cards.partnership2: Within the framework of cooperation, education is provided based on modern programming methods, practical experience, and international standards.
cards.career1: Python programming language is currently one of the most popular and in-demand programming languages. With its help, there are opportunities to work in various fields.
cards.career2: After completing the course, students will have skills in creating effective resumes and attracting employers.

learningModules.title: Python Basics
learningModules.description: Participants will learn Python basics and program in one of the most popular programming languages!

learningModules.title: Theory and Practice
learningModules.description: Write your first code and strengthen theory through practice!

learningModules.title: Career Preparation
learningModules.description: They will create effective resumes and attract employers to help them start their careers successfully!

apio.title: APIO - Asia-Pacific Informatics Olympiad
apio.description: APIO is an online olympiad designed for young people with high algorithmic knowledge, which serves as an important preparation stage for the most prestigious international competition in the world of competitive programming for many countries - the International Olympiad in Informatics (IOI).

cards.about1: APIO is considered one of the most prestigious informatics olympiads in the Asia-Pacific region. It is designed for young people with high-level algorithmic knowledge.
cards.about2: This type of competition helps the younger generation develop skills in logical and algorithmic thinking, creative approaches, and solving complex problems.
cards.ioi1: APIO is considered an important preparation stage for the International Olympiad in Informatics (IOI). Through this olympiad, students prepare for international-level competitions.
cards.ioi2: IOI is the most prestigious international competition in the world of competitive programming, where the world's best young programmers participate.
cards.participation1: Only young people with high algorithmic knowledge can participate in the olympiad. Participants must have the ability to solve complex programming problems.
cards.participation2: The competition is held in online format and lasts 5 hours. Participants develop solutions to given problems.

skills.title: Algorithmic Thinking
skills.description: Developing and optimizing algorithmic approaches to solve complex problems.

skills.title: Logical Thinking
skills.description: Analyzing problems, drawing logical conclusions, and finding effective solutions.

skills.title: Creative Approach
skills.description: Solving problems with new and innovative methods, developing creative thinking.

itVillage.title: IT Village
itVillage.subtitle: "IT Village" is not just education, but a major initiative aimed at creating a digital ecosystem
itVillage.description: The "IT Village" program is an important initiative created for free education of youth in digital technologies, foreign languages, and modern professions in 13 remote districts and 1 city of Uzbekistan. This project was approved by the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan by Decree PQ-178 of May 15, 2024, and is aimed at forming an innovative educational environment in the regions. The state plans continuous motivation of students within the program, as well as attracting highly qualified specialists and mentors. "IT Villages" provide youth with broad opportunities to study modern professions and find their place in the global IT market. "IT-Villages" with modern infrastructure serve to prepare youth for the international labor market, employment, and development of IT services export. Thanks to the conditions being created within the project, technological innovations are rapidly developing in the regions and new opportunities are opening up for youth.

sections.directionsDesc: There are no age restrictions in the project for all those who want to study. Within the project, youth can gain knowledge from leading mentors of the world in 5 directions.
sections.regions: Regions where IT Villages are located
sections.regionsDesc: The IT Village program is being created in 13 remote districts and 1 city of Uzbekistan. In each region, modern educational opportunities are being created for youth.

map.selectRegionDesc: Click on a region on the map to view information

icpc.title: ICPC - International Collegiate Programming Contest
icpc.description: ICPC (International Collegiate Programming Contest) is the world's largest and most prestigious international olympiad in competitive programming among students, held annually since 1970. This olympiad unites thousands of teams worldwide.

goals.title: Increasing Interest
goals.description: Increasing interest in algorithms and programming among students

goals.title: Preparation
goals.description: Opportunity to prepare students for solving real engineering problems

format: Team composition: 3 students and one coach. Teams must solve several algorithmic problems on one computer within 5 hours.
Successful problem solving requires participants to have deep mathematical knowledge, algorithmic thinking, and programming skills.

stages.title: Regional Stage
stages.description: Held in each region, local talents are identified. At this stage, teams compete for a ticket to the Republican stage.

stages.title: Republican Stage
stages.description: Regional stage winners compete to identify the strongest teams at the national level. Teams that achieve high rankings at this stage receive a ticket to the next stage.

stages.title: Semi-final
stages.description: Semi-final competitions are held in Astana, Kazakhstan. 15-20 teams from Uzbekistan are invited to participate.

stages.title: Final
stages.description: Teams that show high results in the semi-final receive a ticket to the world final to compete with the world's strongest programming teams.

importance: ICPC is supported by major IT companies such as Google, IBM, Microsoft. This olympiad is considered one of the most prestigious programming competitions in the world.

Participation in the ICPC olympiad is considered a prestigious achievement and opens wide opportunities for future careers. This is an opportunity for students to demonstrate their abilities at the international level.

ict4girls.title: ICT4Girls - Competitive Programming Olympiad
ict4girls.description: "ICT4Girls" - an olympiad in competitive programming among girls under 20 years old, held at regional and republican stages.
about: Applications are submitted by female students from various regions of Uzbekistan to participate in the "ICT4Girls" olympiad and pass the primary selection.

The regional stage of the "ICT4Girls" olympiad is held in all regions ‚Äì 12 provinces, Republic of Karakalpakstan and Tashkent, where participants develop solutions to given problems and earn points.

stages.title: Regional Stage
stages.description: All regions ‚Äì 12 provinces, Republic of Karakalpakstan and Tashkent, participants develop solutions to given problems and earn points.

stages.title: Republican Stage
stages.description: Girls who show the highest results at the regional stage receive a ticket to the Republican stage.

stages.title: Winners
stages.description: Girls who show the highest results at the Republican stage are recognized as winners of the ICT4Girls olympiad and are awarded valuable prizes.

conditions: Only girls under 20 years old can participate in the olympiad. All participants have the opportunity to demonstrate their knowledge and skills in competitive programming.
Girls who show the highest results at the regional stage receive a ticket to the Republican stage and have the right to compete at the next stage.

itCertificates.title: IT Certificates - Compensation for International IT Certificates
itCertificates.description: The project was created to unite information about talented youth in the IT field. Within the framework of the project, from March 1, 2024, a procedure has been introduced to compensate up to 60% of youth expenses for international IT certificates, as well as 100% of expenses for youth with B2 and higher level certificates for international professional IT certificates.

breadcrumb.current: IT Certificates - Compensation for International IT Certificates

requirements.title: Age Restrictions
requirements.description: Age restrictions are set for participation in the project. Only citizens within the specified age range can apply.

requirements.title: Citizenship
requirements.description: The project is intended only for citizens of the Republic of Uzbekistan. Citizens of other states cannot participate.

requirements.title: Registration
requirements.description: Registration through the Unified Portal of Interactive State Services is mandatory for applying.

compensationTypes.title: Regular Compensation:
compensationTypes.description: Up to 60% of expenses for international IT certificates are compensated. This type of compensation is available to all participants.

compensationTypes.title: Full Compensation:
compensationTypes.description: For youth with B2 and higher level English language certificates, 100% of expenses for professional IT certificates are compensated.

documents.title: Payment Receipt
documents.description: Copy of payment receipt confirming expenses for obtaining international IT certificate (in PDF format)

documents.title: Bank Information
documents.description: Information about active national currency bank plastic card to which compensation funds will be directed

documents.title: English Language Certificate
documents.description: Copy of international certificate confirming B2 and higher level proficiency (in PDF format)

documents.title: Training Document
documents.description: Copy of documents confirming completion of training course for obtaining IT certificate (in PDF format)

applicationProcess: Citizens of the Republic of Uzbekistan who have reached the age of fourteen and are not older than thirty years, wishing to take advantage of this opportunity, can submit an application by registering through the Unified Portal of Interactive State Services.

If the applicant is filling out a questionnaire for compensation of expenses for a training course to obtain an international IT certificate, it is necessary to provide a copy of documents confirming training for obtaining an international IT certificate and completion of the training course (in PDF format).

jobEdu.description2: In this organized job and education fair, companies and educational organizations working in the IT field participate with their job vacancies and educational opportunities.
jobEdu.description3: At the fair, representatives of local and international companies working in the digital technology sector, educational organizations, especially higher education institutions and IT training centers, provide youth participating in the fair with information about conditions created in organizations, job vacancies, as well as existing educational programs.

Classes are organized based on international standards, and teacher-mentors have the opportunity to master advanced approaches in digital technologies.

content: Zarnigor Rakhimova participated in the European Girls' Olympiad (EGOI) as part of the Uzbekistan national team at the prestigious olympiad held in Eindhoven, Netherlands, July 21-27, 2024.
In this prestigious competition, which was attended by about 200 representatives from 57 countries, Zarnigor Rakhimova from the Uzbekistan team won a bronze medal with 329 points.
Zarnigor is a graduate of the 12th general education school of Kogon district, Bukhara region.
Accordingly, Zarnigor Rakhimova was awarded an educational grant from Amity University as the winner of the International IT Olympiad.

Amity University awarded Zarnigor Rakhimova the nomination "Most Fortunate Programmer", recognizing her outstanding success in the "Best Programmer" competition, her outstanding programming skills and innovative approach.
Abror Juraev is a graduate of PDP Academy and achieved great success in programming during his studies.
He has deep knowledge in frontend technologies and actively works in current projects.
Located in Andijan region and makes a great contribution to the local IT community.
Zarnigor Rakhimova participated in the European Girls' Olympiad (EGOI) as part of the Uzbekistan national team at the prestigious olympiad held in Eindhoven, Netherlands, July 21-27, 2024.
In this prestigious competition, which was attended by about 200 representatives from 57 countries, Zarnigor Rakhimova from the Uzbekistan team won a bronze medal with 329 points.
Zarnigor is a graduate of the 12th general education school of Kogon district, Bukhara region.
Accordingly, Zarnigor Rakhimova was awarded an educational grant from Amity University as the winner of the International IT Olympiad.

Amity University awarded Zarnigor Rakhimova the nomination "Most Fortunate Programmer", recognizing her outstanding success in the "Best Programmer" competition, her outstanding programming skills and innovative approach.
Sevinch Mukimova is a graduate of Alloma Study Center and achieved success in the field of design.
Located in Tashkent city, specialist in UI/UX design.
Develops her creative abilities and studies modern design trends.
